From what I understand of the library, the ModifiedKeyStroke and KeyPress functions work as a "KeyDown" and then "KeyUp". What you need to do in order to use that shortcut is to hold the Ctrl key down while the vertical stroll happens -- so, switching ModifiedKeyStroke to KeyPress and then using the Mouse scroll function should (theoretically) work.

Hope this helps. I know this post is like 10 months old, though...

Oh--word of caution: Be sure to use a "KeyUp" function after you're done, or the OS will be stuck thinking that key is held down. I fixed this once by rebooting my computer, but it's inconvenient and all you need is another line of code.
